description: Docker-compose is invalid for local development, It does not include local files. Please make sure that the volume with `.` is mounted into app folder in each container. Make sure that it still starts and works, it's not a problem that each contanier will have code of other shared libs (even should). If needed add additional targets in docker files, so in dev, these will be set using docker-compose - this could be useful to set correct CMD for reloads for local dev.
title: Update Docker Compose volumes for local development
